situation: A few players are playing a boardgame. The current state of the game is as follows. The husky has a 12 x 14 inches notebook. And the rules of the game are as follows. Rule1: The living creature that takes over the emperor of the mouse will also suspect the truthfulness of the chihuahua, without a doubt. Rule2: The husky will take over the emperor of the mouse if it (the husky) has a notebook that fits in a 18.9 x 15.8 inches box. Rule3: If something trades one of the pieces in its possession with the mule, then it does not take over the emperor of the mouse. Rule3 is preferred over Rule2.
question: Based on the game state and the rules and preferences, does the husky suspect the truthfulness of the chihuahua?
label: proved
